participant_1.background:
I like to keep in touch with my friends and family on social media, but I don't spend all my time on it.
I prefer to listen to music that gets my blood pumping and gets me ready to take on the day.
I take a moment to myself and listen to some calming music.
i always have a beer after work.
i like to make boats on the weekends.

participant_2.background:
I am a tour guide at the Grand Canyon.
My favorite part of my current job is getting to spend time outdoors with my dogs.
I just finished walking my dog, and now I'm getting ready to start studying.
i ve flown out of the country.
i cannot cook.

content.text: I am excited to start my day. I am going to build a boat on the weekend.
That is awesome! I wish I could build things, I cannot cook or build.
Well you're a tour guide at the grand canyon, so you must know a lot about nature!
Yeah that is true, I am really passionate about nature and animals. I love spending time with my dogs.
That sounds really cool. I just got back from a trip to Japan. I loved seeing all the different animals there.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to go to Japan. I have been all over the United States but never out of the country.
I would love to visit more of the United States. I have only been to a few states.
You should! There are so many beautiful places to see.
I know, I have a lot of traveling to do.
I am sure you will have a lot of fun.
Thanks, I am looking forward to it!
